message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor, hoping we can reach an agreement quickly.
I'm not going for a 60/40 split. I'll give you a better deal, but I'm not being too generous. Take it or leave it.
Okay, I see you're not budging. I'll counter with a 40/60 split in your favor. Let's see if we can find common ground before we lose more money.
I'm not convinced by your 40/60 split. I'll try to meet you in the middle. I'll give you 4500, but I think I deserve more. Take it or leave it.
